name: To The Skies (Zorphius)
description:
Leap across platforms above the clouds as you race against the clock; To The Skies is a 3D platformer with a twist: you can make platforms emerge out of any object. Run, climb, and launch your way across the levels in order to reach the goal. Challenge yourself by trying to beat the Turbo Time set for each level, or even or even compete with yourself by racing against your previous best times.

Controls

WASD - Move

Right Click - Aim

Left Click - Place Platform
